name: The inhabitants of the Iron Mountain
description: On the Great Kurultai – a meeting of the high ranked people of the tea bowl-towns Almalyk, it is decided to send a food caravan to the giant’s lair. In order to fulfill her mission as a savior Amina Turan embarks on this dangerous quest. During their journey the girl rescues the people from the last caravan from the clutches of an imminent death. Together with the rescued people Amina overcomes great obstacles on the path to the secret rock shelter, where the sacred Book of Destiny is hidden. They hardly run away from the bewitched monsters – the tiger-wolves.
